detail_desc: Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Straight-cut coat woven in a wool blend that finishes just above the knees. High stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Coat in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, a concealed double-breasted front, and side pockets. Lined.
Coat in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, a concealed double-breasted front, and side pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and flap front pockets. Lined.

Jacquard-knit jacket with a stand-up collar and gold-coloured zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour piping, zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Pattern-weave car coat with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Long raglan sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.

Trousers in a pattern weave containing glittery threads with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, jetted back pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.

Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and adjustable plastic fastener at the front. Zipped side pockets, flap leg pockets with press-studs and welt back pockets. Low crotch and legs with an elastic drawstring at the hems and a concealed zip at the knees to convert the trousers into shorts.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a small text appliqué and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Wide blouse in softly draping satin with a sheen. Wide neckline with gathers for added width and a soft draping effect, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in soft, stretch twill with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Trousers in soft, stretch twill with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Trousers in soft, stretch twill with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Trousers in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Slightly boxy-style top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft jersey. Wide-fitting, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft jersey. Wide-fitting, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft jersey. Wide-fitting, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Pyjama T-shirt and leggings in soft jersey. T-shirt in a viscose and cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Leggings in patterned cotton with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama T-shirt and leggings in soft jersey. T-shirt in a viscose and cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Leggings in patterned cotton with an elasticated waist.
Shortie briefs in soft cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Shortie briefs in soft cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Straight-cut, sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with sequined and beaded embroidery at the top. Draping at the front of the neckline and a concealed zip at the back of the neck. Lined at the top.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a press-stud and elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in warming, functional fabric that helps you retain your natural body temperature. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length lace dress with short sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with an inset lace trim and pleats. Airy jersey lining.
Knee-length lace dress with short sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with an inset lace trim and pleats. Airy jersey lining.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in Sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in Sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in Sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in velour with reversible sequins. High waist with concealed elastication. Jersey lining.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high polo neck, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides, cutaway coverage at the back and a low waist with covered elastication.
